experience: Don't miss out on AdRoll's upcoming Product Tech Talk on October 24th! Learn from industry thought-leader Randall Lewis from Netflix and AdRoll's Product and Engineering leaders to see how we’re tackling the problem of measuring, and optimizing towards, the causal impact of ads. More details and sign up below.

AdRoll is the largest independent retargeting and prospecting platform with over 25,000 clients worldwide. It specializes in performance marketing for several verticals including e-commerce, b2b, finance, travel, education, and media, and analyzes data on over 1 billion anonymous user profiles across desktop, mobile, and tablet devices through its proprietary technology. Partnering with top media and tech companies including Google, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and Apple, along with millions of websites and mobile apps, the company is home to the world's largest opt-in advertiser data co-op. AdRoll’s goal is to map the world’s intent data and put it to work for every advertiser on the planet.We take our work seriously but not ourselves. Join a growing team built on core values of transparency, autonomy, hiring and retaining great people and always doing right by our customers.As Manager, I:-> Lead a team of 5: 3 Recruiters, 1 Coordinator and 1 Sourcer-> Manage senior leadership positions full cycle-> Partner with our VP of Engineering and technical recruiting teams to build out scalable recruiting strategies e.g. intern hiring, interview training, diversity recruiting-> Report Progress and Data to our Director of Recruiting and key stakeholders

AdRoll is the largest independent retargeting and prospecting platform with over 25,000 clients worldwide. It specializes in performance marketing for several verticals including e-commerce, b2b, finance, travel, education, and media, and analyzes data on over 1 billion anonymous user profiles across desktop, mobile, and tablet devices through its proprietary technology. Partnering with top media and tech companies including Google, Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and Apple, along with millions of websites and mobile apps, the company is home to the world's largest opt-in advertiser data co-op. AdRoll’s goal is to map the world’s intent data and put it to work for every advertiser on the planet.We take our work seriously but not ourselves. Join a growing team built on core values of transparency, autonomy, hiring and retaining great people and always doing right by our customers.Come roll with us.As a Tech Recruiter in NA, I am:-> Hiring Full Stack Engineers for multiple teams-> Hiring Big Data Engineers, Data Science Engineers, BI Analysts and Erlang Developers.-> Running our Eng Intern Program-> Defining and executing on our Greenhouse optimisation strategy to ensure consistency and reduce bias in candidate assessment-> Contributing to and executing on D&I strategy-> Facilitating behavioural interview training to tech hiring teams-> Mentoring our technical sourcer

AdRoll, headquartered in downtown San Francisco with additional offices in New York, Dublin, London, Sydney and Tokyo is a performance marketing platform that helps brands of all sizes run highly targeted, data-driven digital marketing campaigns. We are continuing to build our world class sales teams within our EMEA HQ based in Dublin and looking for smart, ambitious sales people who want to help us revolutionize the display advertising industry. With a product that customers love, an extremely talented product and engineering team building cutting edge solutions, a generous commission structure and a fun, work hard / play hard culture, this is a unique opportunity to join a special company.In AdRoll, I am:-> letting the good times roll and having lots of fun :-)-> Increasing the scope of my role to include hiring for our London office working with remote managers-> Managing the full recruitment cycle across various roles and markets with a key focus on Sales, Account Management, Customer Support, Finance and Sales Ops. -> Developing Talent Communities in LinkedIn and Greenhouse (our ATS) for tough language roles e.g. DACH, Nordics, Benelux-> Partnering with all EMEA Hiring Managers regularly to provide updates and market insight to give recommendations for hiring strategy and tactics -> Hosting referral sessions and building out our referrals program-> Working with marketing on employment branding initiatives e.g. our Tyba page -> Working with training lead to develop interview training for our interview panelsKey Achievements:-> Partnered closely with HR and Sales Management to design and roll out our first internal hiring process for team lead positions

AdRoll, headquartered in downtown San Francisco with additional offices in New York, Dublin, London, Sydney and Tokyo is a performance marketing platform that helps brands of all sizes run highly targeted, data-driven digital marketing campaigns. We are continuing to build our world class sales teams within our EMEA HQ based in Dublin and looking for smart, ambitious sales people who want to help us revolutionize the display advertising industry. With a product that customers love, an extremely talented product and engineering team building cutting edge solutions, a generous commission structure and a fun, work hard / play hard culture, this is a unique opportunity to join a special company.In AdRoll, I am:-> Managing the full recruitment cycle across various roles and markets with a key focus on DACH, Nordics and Benelux as well as FRITS-> Developing Talent Communities in LinkedIn and Greenhouse (our ATS) -> Partnering with Hiring Managers regularly to provide updates and market insight to give recommendations for hiring strategy and tactics -> Hosting referral sessions Key Achievements:-> Partnered with marketing to organise AdRoll's recruitment presence and stand at dmexco in Cologne 2014-> Hosted a training session on Jobvite reporting for global recruiting leads-> Partnered with Hiring Managers throughout ATS migration to revamp our interview kits and scorecards

Workday is the leader in enterprise-class, software-as-a-service (SaaS), true Cloud based application solutions for managing global businesses. Our solutions combine the lower cost of ownership of SaaS with a modern approach to applications. Founded by PeopleSoft veterans Dave Duffield and Aneel Bhusri, Workday delivers Human Capital Management, Payroll, Financial Management and Worker Spend Management solutions for midsize and Fortune 500 companies.I was working as a sourcer on the following types of roles:-> Software Engineering (Java/OO programming in agile environment)-> Cloud/Web based Application Development -> QA/Software Testing - functional and technical-> Test Automation-> Cloud Security-> Functional and Technical Support Analysts-> Corporate Sales DevelopmentAs a sourcer, I used the following tools:-> LinkedIn-> monster.ie-> Social Media e.g. Twitter and Facebook-> Google searches, X-Ray searches-> Jobvite, our ATSI partnered with the global sourcing team to develop strategies on building up talent communities and partner effectively with recruiters and hiring managers.
Irish Institute of Training and Development
Professional Practice Certificate in Training and Development

This certificate is split into two core Modules.Module 1: Training Needs Identification and Design (Distinction - 95%)Module 2: Training Delivery and Evaluation (Distinction - 93%)Some key areas focused on:1. Context of training and development in organisations2. Training Needs Analysis - organisation, job and individual level3. Training Design4. Training Delivery5. Training Evaluation6. Pedagogy and Andragogy (Adult Learning Theory)
Irish Institute of Training and Development
Professional Practice Certificate in Training and Development

This certificate is split into two core Modules.Module 1: Training Needs Identification and Design (Distinction - 95%)Module 2: Training Delivery and Evaluation (Distinction - 93%)Some key areas focused on:1. Context of training and development in organisations2. Training Needs Analysis - organisation, job and individual level3. Training Design4. Training Delivery5. Training Evaluation6. Pedagogy and Andragogy (Adult Learning Theory)

This degree gives insight into every aspect of managing a business from HRM to Finance to Management to Marketing.Through the internships that are required as part of my studies I have gained a practical knowledge of what I have learned theoretically.Taking German with this degree has enabled me to live there for a year demonstrating my adaptability, flexibility and open-mindedness.During my time in DCU I volunteered with the DCU Access Service and acted as a student representative for the DCU Access Service at various fund-raisers and events. I also helped them with their Annual Achievement Awards where I was responsible for organising and coordinating a group of school students. I also took part in their shadowing programme in which a school student shadowed me for the day to get an idea about college life in DCU.

I also helped them with their Annual Achievement Awards where I was responsible for organising and coordinating a group of school students. IPBS year abroad in ESB Business School, Reutlingen

As part of my studies in DCU, I did a year abroad in the ESB Business School, Reutlingen where I studied, took my exams and worked in German. It was during this year I did my 6 month internship with SAP.
IPBS year abroad in ESB Business School, Reutlingen

As part of my studies in DCU, I did a year abroad in the ESB Business School, Reutlingen where I studied, took my exams and worked in German. It was during this year I did my 6 month internship with SAP.

I helped to:1. Organise the files and documents for all incoming first year scholarship students.2. Update the relevant Excel databases that were being used.  3. Execute a mature student orientation summer school and answer various questions from the students.

Sarah supported me for several months as a Recruitment Associate at LinkedIn.I have been nothing but impressed with her readiness and eagerness to jump at every learning opportunity!She is smart, sharp, and reliable. Sarah will work through heavy workload with an eagle eye, exceeding your expectations. She will flourish is a situation that is demanding, and complex. She delivered fantastic quality work, supporting several stakeholders. Thank you Sarah for your invaluable input and for making it so easy for me to trust you.

Ian McIlwain
EMEA Sales Manager - LinkedIn Learning
May 12, 2013, Ian was senior to Sarah but didn’t manage directly

This year we grew a team from 4 people to 10, and promoted 3 of those original 4 into new positions so we needed to backfill ... this would be quite a daunting task without amazing support from a recruiter like Sarah. Sarah’s support not only to find solid candidates, but also make sure the process was like clockwork and the candidates had an experience worthy of our company was great. As hiring managers we try to describe what characteristics are important to us for the role (beyond “we just need that certain X-Factor!”), but Sarah really quickly worked out what we were looking for and I can honestly say there was not one candidate that I interviewed and wondered why they'd made it to that stage in the process. We spoke to many who may not have had the typical background, but we all agreed were absolute gems … before Sarah moved on to her next challenge she made sure that our mission was 100% completed. Nice work Sarah and thanks again for the hard work.

Tim Teinzer
IT Strategy at SAP
August 14, 2011, Tim was senior to Sarah but didn’t manage directly

I personally appreciated Sarah's support in my area of resposibility for VPS Marketing & Communications which also included reporting and event management of an executive summit. During her 6 months in our SAP team, Sarah took over a lot of tasks and responsibilties beyond the usual scope of a student internship and completeted them with great success.Her excellent time management and organizational skills enabled her to work under time pressure and consistently meet tight deadlines. Despite being an intern, Sarah's role included regular communication with colleagues in senior positions which she managed very professionally and successfully. I would like to thank Sarah both for her professional support to take the Value Partnership Service offering to the next level and her outstanding personal contribution to the team spirit in our group.I am absolutely sure that every team will benefit from having Sarah as a team member and I would be happy to work with Sarah again in the future.

Diane S. Bettencourt, MBA
Director, Global Corporate Procurement
December 9, 2016, Sarah worked with Diane S. in different groups

Diane has been an absolute dream to partner with for our procurement needs. She's incredibly relationship orientated both internally and externally to make sure everyone comes out of a negotiation winning. Working with her on contracts and negotiations for Talent Acquisition tools and staffing vendors has been the smoothest experience I've had to date. She's highly responsive while offering words of wisdom and advice as needed to empower teams and people to be better and fair negotiators. I sincerely hope I get to work with Diane again. The impact she's had for Talent Acquisition tooling and partnerships will be felt for a long time to come.

Leni Rokosova
Building AUS & NZ teams for Meltwater. Hiring now!
December 8, 2016, Sarah was senior to Leni but didn’t manage directly

Leni is a rock-star addition to any team. She was originally hired in AdRoll to support me as a sourcer for tough to fill roles in EMEA. Over the last 18 months, I have thoroughly enjoyed seeing Leni grow and develop as one of the strongest full cycle in-house recruiters I have had the pleasure to work with. She's built incredible trust with her hiring teams and candidates exemplifying what it means to partner closely with the business to understand and get ahead of hiring needs. She's particularly strong at providing excellent candidate experience while building and executing thought-out search strategies to fill roles quickly while ensuring candidate quality. Always open feedback and a brain-storming or sourcing session, she's a great team player and problem solver.

summary: I'm letting the good times roll by building my career in technical recruitment with AdRoll: the most widely used retargeting platform in the world.Currently, we're hiring for:Real Time Bidding Engineers - Erlang, Python, real time systems experienceFull Stack Engineers - Python, React, Redux, DockerData Science Engineer - C++, Python, Java, strong mathematical/statistics background coupled with software development experienceBig Data Engineers - Java, Python, Hadoop or Spark or Hive or HBaseData Scientists - SQL, R, Python, strong mathematical/statistics backgroundIf you're interested in exploring career opportunities with AdRoll, feel free to connect or send me an email (sarah.hallahan@adroll.com)More open positions can be found at our career site: https://www.adroll.com/en-IE/about/careers/open-positions
name: Sarah Hallahan
title: Manager, Technical Talent Aquisition
